DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety VI-0521 compare placebo glycemic management obese diabetic adult .
DOC.brief_title: Study VI-0521 Compared Placebo Glycemic Management Obese Diabetics
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Type 2 Diabetes BMI 2742 Specified diet/exercise and/or diabetes medication BP > 150/95 Stroke/MI/unstable cardiovascular disease within 6 month Clinically significant renal , hepatic , psychiatric disease Unstable thyroid disease replacement therapy Nephrolithiasis Obesity know genetic endocrine origin Participation formal weight loss program lifestyle intervention History glaucoma Pregnancy breastfeed Alcohol abuse Eating disorder Excluded medication
